title: Print, "Proofs of four plates of "Alfabeto in Sogno" [Dream Alphabet]: Letter K", 1683
medium: White laid paper with red brayon
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: Central image of a man fettered to a tree trunk forming the letter K with additional drawings of six feet and a shell.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Proofs of four plates of "Alfabeto in Sogno" [Dream Alphabet]: Letter K", 1683.
1683. White laid paper with red brayon. Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane. 1944-24-8-d.
